price: Wͻ’si (amanfoͻ) kwan wͻ (Nkͻm-hyεni) ho, εna wͻ’si wͻn ara nso ho kwan wͻ neho. Sε (wͻ’yε saa a), wͻn ara na wͻ’redi wͻn ho awuo nanso wͻ’nhunu saa.
arabic: وَهُمۡ يَنۡهَوۡنَ عَنۡهُ وَيَنۡـَٔوۡنَ عَنۡهُۖ وَإِن يُهۡلِكُونَ إِلَّآ أَنفُسَهُمۡ وَمَا يَشۡعُرُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wahum yanhawna ʿanhu wayanawna ʿanhu wa-in yuh'likūna illā anfusahum wamā yashʿurūna
